@@ -0,0 +1,24 @@
+{
+	"description": "The first step in creating new type schema in Synapse is to setup and configure an organization. The name of the organization servers as the root for each schema's $id managed by that organization.  The organization name ‘org.sagebionetworks’ is reserved for the core Synapse model objects.   Each organization also has an Access Control List (ACL) that controls who can add schemas to an organization.  All schemas created under an Organization will be considered publicly readable and reference-able. Organizations are immutable",

nodes.bodyText: Might want to consider to rename it to OrganizationCreateRequest
Increase the min size to something like 6 or 8?
Typo in the exception message, chracters->characters
You are not setting the endpoints for this client

We should leave the getRequestURL() since getHttpMethod() would be very confusing. We should also comment that there is a bug where getHttpMethod() returns the path instead of the verb. The error message can be built using the request parameter instead.
